perc_total_25_3_using_devices.long_description: Percent of the total population with a good internet speed, which is defined as above 25/3 MB/S and able to stream video or online games for one device. Geographies: Block group (12), Census tract (11), County (5), Health Districts (51_hd)
perc_total_25_3_using_devices.long_name: Percent of the Total Population with Good Internet Speed
perc_total_25_3_using_devices.short_description: Percent of the total population with a good internet speed, which is defined as above 25/3 MB/S and able to stream video or online games for one device. Geographies: Block group (12), Census tract (11), County (5), Health Districts (51_hd)
perc_total_25_3_using_devices.statement: {value} of the total population in {features.name} has a good internet speed.
